markdownRemark.html:
Over 90,000 different combinations to choose from.

Including 8 standard cars (you can mix and mash these to form over 100 combinations) one of 3 optional spoiler. Front facing weapons. Change wheel size and rim design Change the overal length of your car to turn a pickup into an extended cab or create a limo. This is the beginning of a larger concept, as I get more experience with OpenSCAD I will update the models (and add some more) to make them look better
